thread.title_full: Seychelles reaches the finals of the Travel Agents Choice Awards in the United KingdomTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Seychelles reaches the finals of the Travel Agents Choice Awards in the United KingdomTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Seychelles reaches the finals of the Travel Agents Choice Awards in the United Kingdom Published on : Thursday, August 20, 2015
Seychelles is among the top finalists in two categories of the Travel Agents Choice Awards 2015, by Selling Travel.
This news is another feat which shows that this destination continues to shine across the globe. The two categories in which Seychelles has excelled are Destination for Spa & Wellness, and Destination for Weddings & Honeymoons.
Travel Agents Choice Awards are high-profile awards that recognise the outstanding performers in the travel industry.
All finalists will be revealed in the September issue of Selling Travel. Voting and nomination are done by the travel retailers of United Kingdom.
The travel retailers will be invited to meet these finalists at the Travel Agents Choice Awards finalists party, in a central London location on September 10.
Voting will start on August 24 and will close on October 7, with winners being announced online on October 14.
The awardees will receive their prizes at a special reception during the upcoming World Travel Market.
Selling Travelâ€™s issue for the month of December will feature a special awards section with reviews of the award presentations, interviews with the award winners and more on their products.
Source:- Seychelles Tourism
